label: 二間
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This room next to the sleeping quarters in the imperial residence housed a Kannon image which was the object of regular veneration by gojisō on behalf of the health and welfare of the emperor from at least the 10th c. on. See Kannon ku.
